page.title: 11A school secretary-cont
page.content: The school secretary fortunately can walk to work,she does not have to rely on a bus service and she also has a telphone.It would be good to have a village shop once more.Apart from the regular school functions which take place probably the other most noticeable event in this area during the past has been the school's centenary.She likes it in Hankham because it is one of the most peaceful part of the area and she hopes it will stay that way,although the proposed motorway and new houses will probably make a great difference.It would be nice to have more children in the village
